Title: Tattered Log
Text:
This isolation zone was constructed after the completion of the vault. Considering that certain research and specimens might pose security risks, the Family built this isolation zone on the island to house these projects. The zone is divided as follows:

Underground Floor 1: Echo Experimentation Area
Underground Floor 2: Item Storage Area (Decommissioned)
Warning: Items in the isolation zone are extremely dangerous. Please do not enter without proper authorization.
